item.title: Markdown Cheatsheet
item.description: To be honest, this list is stolen, stolen from the original author of the TOHA theme I’m using for this site. Thank you for preparing this is, so I can use it as well @hossainemruz This is a sample post intended to test the followings: A different post author. Table of contents. Markdown content rendering. Math rendering. Emoji rendering. Markdown Syntax Rendering Headings The following HTML <h1>—<h6> elements represent six levels of section headings.

item.title: Checklist
item.description: Checkliste Übersetzungen Sections ins englische Übersetzen Intro-Seite About Seite Skills Erfahrung Projekte Checkliste Übersetzungen Blogposts schreiben (DE&EN) Hello World Post Erster Post (Beruflich)
